title: Pink or Black ?
description: About the Author Tishaa Khosla wrote her first bestseller, Pink or Black, at the age of sixteen. The book is based on her school years at The Lawrence School, Sanawar. She went on to study filmmaking at the New York Film Academy in Los Angeles. She was assistant director for the blockbuster Bollywood film, Bodyguard and continues to work in the film industry.
author: Tishaa
